I got this for my wife at Christmas to replace her falling-apart wallet.  It's holding up well so far and all its construction seems top notch with nice thick leather that doesn't look like it will rip (the coin pouch in my own wallet was so thin it started ripping after a month).  The coin pouch on the Visconti wallet is closed by a sturdy zipper and has a partition in the middle so you can put different kinds of coins on each side or maybe a key or whatever.

If carrying coins and having a wallet that closes with a button for carrying in a purse is your thing, I think this wallet will last for years.
summary: Great quality and love the coin pouch

reviewText: The pocket areas are excellent for fitting my small flash drives. The wallet is very sturdy, and literally feels so good to the touch.

If you don't mind the lump, it might fit into an back pants pocket but it might fall out, not to mention stretch your pockets too.
I will definitely make additional purchases from this seller!

reviewText: My husband loves it!

I bought this for my husband, 6'4" with very long arms to match.  The robe come to his mid calf, which isn't bad.  The sleeves are a short, but not annoyingly so, they rest above his wrists.  There was some shrinking at the first wash, but the weight is great for cold Nebraska winters.

I like the way this robe envelops you, over the neck, down to the ankles, and with a lush over spaciousness around the chest and waist.  It absorbs water well: you can throw it on after the shower and yet it's ample enough to drink up water so that you don't feel you're in a wet rug.  It washed well the first time, and shrinkage seemed to be minimal; there was a lot of lint, but that's probably normal, and I haven't yet noticed the loose threads that other reviewers have noted.  Also, the belt is most definitely not too short; indeed, it's long enough to throw into a loose knot with some inches to spare.  The only drawback, surprisingly, is that this large robe is not especially dense or heavy; if robes were ranked like coats, this would be a spring/autumn one, not winter, since it just isn't heavy enough, even with that built-in muff around the neck, to keep you warm in a cool house.  A note on cost:  At $53, this was just outside my budget, and I bought it only reluctantly; at best, it is worth this price.  After purchase, but before this review, the price exploded to $64, and it simply is NOT worth it.  Buy below $55, but avoid at any higher price.
summary: Pretty good, but recent price rise loses it a star.

reviewText: Not a bad robe - it's warm and cozy with good cotton - but quality control needs to be improved as one pocket came apart after first wearing due to incomplete sewing.
Excellent robe
Recipient really seemed to like it

My husband loves it!  My husband didn't like robes until we were on vacation and one of the hotels we stayed at provided complimentary robes.  He fell in love with it but unfortunately they didn't have anymore available. I looked around on Amazon and found this one.  It is perfect!  It is on the warmer side, but my husband plans to use it in the winter when we get out of our hot tub.  Well that was his plan; instead he is wearing it every night because it is so comfortable. Also,  it arrived on time and the company also contacted me to make sure I was happy with their product.  When I emailed them my response they answered within 5 minutes!  I have never had service this good.  My husband likes it so much he may end up buying me one for my birthday!

I used to have a robe. I got it when I was about 15. I loved that robe. Soft and warm, it was my friend after every shower. Sadly that friendship came to an end several years ago when the robe finally fell apart. I mean literally fell apart. I opened up the dryer one day to find scraps and some lint and that was about it. I've never found another robe like it. I've resorted to stealing my husband's robe but there's something about it I don't like. It's not the color; it's the heavy, sweaty, non-breathing material it's made from. To be honest my husband isn't a huge fan either, for the same reason.

Then I found the wonderful Egyptian Cotton Terry Cloth robe from Exceptional Sheets. This robe that is so similar to my old robe that it immediately takes me back. It's super soft. It's warm without being unbearable like my hubby's robe. And it wicks away water just like a towel. Even my husband loves it. Fortunately I had the foresight to get it in pink, so he won't wear it. Now the problem is that I have to buy one for him (in a different color of course).

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~

The Egyptian Cotton Terry Cloth Robe by Exceptional Sheets comes elegantly packaged and was labeled with a ribbon and tag that read 100% Egyptian cotton. As soon as I saw the package I thought about the upcoming holidays and how nice of a gift this product would make. I ordered a pink robe and was pleased to see that the product I received matches the product pictured perfectly; this is often not the case when it comes to online purchases. I also feel it is noteworthy to point out that the robe shipped and arrived quickly.

When the robe first arrived it had little fabric balls on it and it wasn't quite as soft as I had wanted it to be. This wasn't a problem because I wash all clothing prior to use so I washed it, following the directions provided, dried it, and found that the robe came out absolutely perfect. All of the fabric balls were gone, the color did not fade, and the robe was very soft.

I also appreciate that Exceptional Sheets provides a size chart which takes the guess work out of ordering. I am 5'4" and tend to order robes a size up; however, the chart would be perfect for anyone looking for the "perfect" fit. The robe hits right around my ankles, the fabric overlaps in the front when I close it, the belt is extra-long, and there are two deep pockets on the front.

I absolutely love my new robe. If I could get away with wearing it to work I would in a heartbeat. After shopping a number of stores looking for a robe I can confidently say that I have not found a robe that compares to the price and quality of the Egyptian Cotton Terry Cloth Robe. This robe is an exceptional value and I look forward to ordering from Exceptional Sheets in the very near future.

I bought this robe for my husband for Christmas.  I had been looking in stores for them, but this one is exceptional.  It's Egyptian cotton and what a difference this makes.  It's warm, comfortable and just all in all great.  Especially good for chilly mornings in Florida after getting out of the hot tub.  Highly recommend this robe.

I have a real love for sitting around the house on my day off, most of the time wearing my bathrobe. The robe I received from ExceptionalSheets is a very well made garment. I've got to have another one and when they come back in stock in Navy, I'm going to order one for myself and one for my brother. Buy one you will not be disappointed.
summary: This is a very nice robe

reviewText: I purchased this on a whim, it wasn't something I NEEDED but I rarely buy things for myself and have been wanting one.  It was a good price so I figured, why not? Let me start off by saying I'm so very glad I pampered myself and decided to put it in my cart.  I want to live in this.  I would do pickup and drop off at my kids' schools if my kids would still claim me as their mom.  When this arrived my husband made me play rock/paper/scissors to 'win' it; even though I'd purchased it for myself.  I didn't think he'd want one; I was wrong!  I'll be order him his own very soon.  This robe fits wonderfully- I bought it in a size up because I wanted it to swallow me up- it fits exactly how expected.  The robe is heavy and thick and is what you would find at a nice hotel.

I bought this robe to replace one I got in a 5 star luxury hotel 25 years ago and that had finally wore out.  This is an exact replacement, but without the logo of the hotel, but perhaps even better in quality. I use it to go the the condo swimming pool every morning and it works fine. I was worried that the color and size might not come as ordered because the Amazon check out did not confirm those details, but everything was just fine. The robe arrived on time, well packaged. I love this belt.  It's strong, but stretchy.  It'll hold your pants up and look good doing it.  Then when you sit down, it gives just enough around the middle to keep from squeezing you.  What's more, the buckle is covered in a leather-like plastic which eliminates my problem of being allergic to metal.  It has no holes in it.  You just put the little metal piece into the belt wherever the fit feels just right.  I'd have given it 5 stars except that I thought belts were supposed to be a few inches longer than your actual waist size so that you have some overlap.  This one didn't.  Since it's stretchy and I'm also losing weight, I can still use it, but I that might not be the case for everyone.  The other belt I bought (same style, same size) was 4 inches longer than this one.

reviewText: When I first put this on, I was concerned it wasn't going to fit. The corset top is very tight, but once I got it buttoned up and pulled up, it fit perfect! The inside is not itchy and it does have some stretch to it in the back, so you don't feel limited on movement. It has 2 rows of snaps, like a bra, so it can be adjusted tighter if it stretches out over time. The colors are bright, just as is pictured. I'm really excited to wear this as part of my costume at Bonnaroo! Highly recommend it!

Looks like a cheap-o item if you ask me. I have been designing clothes for over 20-years. If you zoom in on the upper bust of the photo provided you can easily see the boning has come loose from the bias tape. You don't use a slim piece of bias tape at the top of a bustier-corset like this and expect the boning not to poke through at some point. It's a cheap, quick and dirty method used by cheap manufacturers to finish the edge. Don't waste your money.

I know that it's better to give than  to receive, but I'd have been happy with something from the dollar store! I ended up giving this to a lady preacher at a bible study group that I used to attend when I lived near there. I don't know if she ever wears it, because a tragedy occurred & I had to move away from an emergency situation. reviewText: I thought I was getting an ivory colored flower.  Mine is yellow, very yellow.  Not loving it, and I bought two of them.

Do not do what I did and buy it thinking it will be alright, unless you are willing to spend an hour or two painting over it with nail polish. Also, the flower WILL pop off. Just superglue it back on.
I bought this for my best friend, saw the color and immediately dug out an unused bottle of metallic pink nail polish. It took probably seven thin coats to get rid of the hideous yellow color. Then I glued the thing back together, let it sit for a few days to let it air out, then gave it to my friend like I'd intended. She loved it.

Might show up a different colour on people less pale than me, but if you don't mind the murky green (or your skin doesn't react to this sort of thing) then I highly recommend it.

The chain on all of the necklaces I have ordered from Amazon (usually shipped form Asia) have a really awkward chain length. I am a rather busty girl, and if I'm wearing a low cut shirt of any kind it falls right down into my cleavage. If I'm not, they sit really oddly on the slope of my boobs. My personal preference would be for them to be a little shorter so they could sit nicely below my neck, or longer than boob length. For girls that aren't very blessed in the chest, I'm sure it wouldn't create quite as much of a problem.

I was so lucky to get this product at a discounted price in exchange for a honest review and I fell in love with it. I'm 5 feet 2 inches and this big luxurious robe covered all of my body and stopped at the base of my feet. I use it for everything. I don't know why others complain about loose threads. It's ring spun cotton, it's expected! But it hasn't happened to mine.

Since this was a terry cloth robe, and not plush, I wasn't sure what the quality and softness would be like.  When the robe first arrived, it seemed thin and rough, but thankfully I suspended my judgement until after washing it.

Although there were a few loose threads after a round in the washer and dryer, it didn't seem to be from any significant seams.  The fabric was considerably softer after being washed.  And don't be fooled by thinking this is a flimsy robe - it's pretty heavy and incredibly warm!  I was surprised by how heavy it actually was, and will be great for winter.

My husband loves the fact that it has a hood, as he can now run around the house pretending to be a Jedi Knight.  So there's that. :)

If you want a luxury item, go ahead and get a plush robe.  But if you're looking for something warm and comfortable at a great price, I highly recommend this one!

I did receive a discounted price in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: I wasn't sure what the quality and softness would be like. When the robe first arrived

I put the robe in the Washer by itself with detergent and fabric Softener.  When I out the rove I to the dryer,  I saw a few loose strings I  the washer,  but it was no different than the previous robe I had purchased.  When we pulled it out of the dryer.... Half the thread on the back was unraveling.  There were threads all over my dryer and all over the robe.  It was destroyed to the point I immediately requested to return the product.  I didn't even want to try to replace it,  because it was that bad... And I see other reviews stating the same.  I'm extremely bummed as this was a nice thick robe that felt much softer after the wash.... I really really wish this hadn't happened.

That said, this is a very inexpensive robe compared to others, and I'm not surprised that the quality isn't the best. The deterioration started after the second wash and it's minor to moderate. Nothing that compromises the integrity of the robe, and unless you plan on hosting dinner parties in this thing, (you weirdo,) then you'll be just fine with a few frayed threads here and there.

When you sacrifice price, sometimes you sacrifice quality as well. In this case, the robes came out of their package with loose threads, which was worrisome. The directions said wash before use and I, quite frankly, was afraid that at the first wash the entire robe would disintegrate into a pile of tangled threads which I would be unable to return. Thanks to Amazon's awesome customer service, I took my chance and washed the robes (I bought two). Much to my delight, they survived just fine and show no shredding or unraveling. Apparently all the loose threads were just that, loose threads from the factory, I guess?  I bought these for my growing children and my son thinks the brown one I purchased for him is like a Jedi robe, so he is most delighted. They both like these robes and while they're not super thick, for the price, they're a good value.

I bought a pair of these for my husband and I to use when we get out of our new hot tub.  I wanted something basic, comfortable and a color that wouldn't be ruined by chlorine from the hot tub.  Well, we didn't even get that far.  I opened the package, they were well packaged and threads fell all over my burgundy colored carpet. I thought it was just extra from settling or something so I continued opening and tried it on.  The fabric is scratchy/starchy and proceeded to leave even more white threads all over the carpet.  At this point I packaged it up as best as I could and set it back in the box with the 2nd robe I didn't open.  I returned these robes and bought 2 at Walmart for around $12.00 each that working just great.  Don't waste your money on these unless you are planning a one-time use - never going to put in the washer type thing.
summary: Poor Quality, nothing premium about this product.

By now we ought to know better but if you get a paid shipping estimate of a few weeks and then your package shows up with a Chinese address as the origin, you're getting a knockoff. I've been to the Jack Daniel's distillery, I've handled their merchandise and this is NOT an official, licensed product. The fabric is thin and nearly see through, the silk screening looks flimsy, and the tag in the collar of the shirt is for Hi-Jeans "fashion popular logo." Buyer beware. Not gorgeous, glamorous or cute. Just a really fine solution to the problem of going and coming (NOT walking six miles or even three) and not having to worry with pulling on boots and pulling them off  and leaving them at the entrance to dry and then having to polish them so they wouldn't be damaged by all that unfortunate precip. My only suggestion (hope you're reading this,Chinese entrepreneurs) would be to attach another velcro strip slightly higher on the boot to provide a little extra stability. Or not. I have purchased  orgone pendants from other sellers who do not encase the pendant in glassy material as LKS does.  The pendants not encased stick like glue to my clothing and immediately lose their shine and prettiness.  Perhaps this is the reason LKS encases all her orgone jewelry in glass.

I wish more of her orgone pendants were made with hemp cords instead of leather.  I am a vegetarian and also do not purchase products made by the leather of murdered animals.  Watch the documentary, Earthlings, narrated by Joaquin Phoenix, and you may not want this energy of suffering in or outside your body.  But this was my mistake, so I kept it.  She still gets 5 stars for her excellent workmanship.

reviewText: This is a very beautiful piece. Its healing properties are remarkable.  I have worn it for only 2 days and this is probably the best I felt in years.  It gives a natural calming at peace feeling and it amplifies your energy level substantially.  It makes you feel really good.

I've noticed a shift in my energy but it is difficult to say if it is the orgone as I am doing many other things as well -  but no matter - it is a beautiful piece of jewelry and well made.  I definitely recommend. Peace.

Are they cool? Yes. Do they work? I haven't got a clue.

While I love the look of this thing, its more a piece of entertainment in my eyes. I can't tell if the effects are placebo, or not.

My Experiences:
1. I tried to wear it to bed. I ended up waking, to the thing choking me. Had to take it off.
2. I tried to wear it during the day. I felt quite happy that day, but that could also be because I love my job.
3. I put it on my wife as she cried her eyes out from a toothpaste commercial (pregnancy). It didn't change anything there.
4. I tried meditating with it. Couldn't concentrate, as the pressure on my chest was uncomfortable for that.

Would I buy one again? Probably not, but I do love having one anyways. Who knows, maybe it will help me one day. Either that, or I'm just a pack rat. Can't tell.

I was looking for a large, durable, multi-pocketed black textured bag for everyday (intensive) use to load up with text books, lunch, water bottle, makeup bag, etc.  This bag suits what I was looking for well.  The shoulder straps comfortably support the weight and the two front and one back exterior pockets hold keys, phone, and small accessories like my phone charger so they are easily accessible without getting lost.  The inside front has two pouches and the inside back has one zippered pocket which holds my pens, lip gloss, etc.  There is also a full width zippered pouch sewn on the inside back wall.  I prefer that to a pouch sewn in the middle of the bag dividing it into two compartments because this bag holds more and the contents of the pouch don't get as crushed. I have two complaints. The first is that the buckle holding the shoulder strap to the bag often irritates my arm (I also tend to hold the strap/buckle as I walk so it irritates my hand/knuckle), but it's not a big concern.  My second, greater complaint is that the zipper to the inside back pouch broke off after less that one week of use. I don't plan to return the bag because the zipper is not visible and the pouch still holds what I want it to but I am concerned about the longevity of this bag.  I'll try to remember to update this in a few months!
summary: useful, stylish bag but the inside zipper broke

reviewText: got this madoka necklace as a bday gift. even if it was two days late, i absolutely loved it! you even get a cute picture of the character you ordered when you open the package (i got the pink/madoka one). definetly buy this if you're a fan of the show. great quality for a great price!

okay, so i thought this was just a normal necklace. boy, was i ever wrong!

the moment i snapped the necklace on, i felt a sharp pain in my chest. my knees were buckling, causing me to fall on the floor. i try to fight the sudden weakness overcoming me, but i just couldn't! my energy was growing weaker, and i eventually blacked out.

when i awoke, there was a creepy white feline with red eyes atop of me, saying things like, "congratulations on your new Soul Gem!" and "now you must fulfill the role of a magical girl!"

the feline lead me to a place that looked like something straight out of a fairy tale, decorated with varieties of patterns and playful music playing in the background. but as cotton headed dolls and odd looking creatures beleaguered me, i knew i needed to fight back. as if it read my mind, the pale white feline opened it's mouth and advised, "Transform with your Soul Gem!"

i held up the pendant, unsure if it would work or not. the pink stone shimmered in the light and made a harmonious jingle. soon enough, i was doused in a luminous glow. i felt the energy i had lost soon flow back into me, and it was even more than i had anticipated.

after that little show, i faced the evil spirits of the demented fairy tale with chains and slingshots. they all disappeared one by one, and a dark figure appeared. it let out a wicked cackle as it squirmed it's way towards me. it bared sharp, dangerous fangs at me and i stood my ground, ready to take the last shot of the night.

the fierce battle with what the feline calls "a nightmare" provided me with a dark pendant. it was the opposite of my own; the stone was cracked, and covered in a cloud of depressing, dark fog. i was advised to keep this dark pendant close to me, "just in case". without any further explanation, the feline pounced off into the night, saying, "I'll see you next time!"

((haha in all seriousness, the necklace is awesome! it arrived on time and came in mint condition. i recommend it to everyone!!))

This is one of the few reviews I've given (ebay doesn't count in my book LOL) and I apologize in advance if it's too long, not detailed enough, too detailed etc.  That being said, here you go!  I honestly believe that this piece deserves very high praise.  I haven't had it for 12 hours yet, so I'm unsure of how well it will hold up to the test of time but I absolutely love them, I am very pleased with my purchase.  I was a little hesitant at first due to a few reviews of customers having problems with the charms falling off?!  I work in retail (if you've ever worked in a retail environment I assume you may be able to relate and if you don't, I hope you can use your imagination).  Retail can be a very abusive place for any kind of jewelry.  As you may imagine, all I could think was how many things it could get caught on.  What would happen if it did? (it had no such encounter this evening, but again I haven't had it very long so there's still a chance it may). As of now this baby moved with me, not against me in my travels of helping customers, stocking the shelves, taking care of the photo department etc.  The fact that it looks AMAZING, and is over all a wonderful quality piece that I plan on adding to (as in getting additional items from ChubbyChicoCharms) are the reason's I decided to write this very long winded review that I'm trying to be thorough with.  As far as the writing being too small goes, it's not as small as I was thinking it would be after some of the comments.  I didn't measure it, but I want to say the charm is roughly 1/2 an inch??  I'm horrible with judging such things, but it feels like a good possibility.  If you've seen comparable bracelets with similar charms, it's the average size in my opinion.  Therefore it's not too small.  Yes, it can certainly be difficult to read, I myself didn't have that issue but I understand it.  Think about how many letters they had to fit on this sized charm.  It's realistic in my book for the lettering to be tiny, there's a lot on it.  Also, you are getting two bracelets with this purchase.  It's exactly as pictured, if you look close, it's clearly two bracelets, one resting on the other, however they are not attached, they move freely on your arm therefore you can wear them together, separately, gift one, whatever you choose. If I discover anything that might be useful to a potential buyer later on down the road and I am allowed to add information I will do my best to improve my review, but for now, this really is a great item, it's well worth the price.

I had a hard time deciding the size on this jacket because I know Korean sizes are usually A LOT tighter than American sizes.

I am 5'6" at 158lb, with a body building physique, 43" bustline, broad delts and large arms.  After reading many reviews, I decided to buy an XL, better to be a bit larger than too tight where I can't even fit it.  Plus, this jacket is more like a suit so you're expecting to wear at least a dress shirt and tanktop beneath this jacket.

PROS:
Fast Delivery, got it within 5 days after submitting the order
Although it was still a bit tight, the sleeve and the bottom wasn't long, making it seem like you're wearing a trench coat.

CONS:
Even with the XL, it fits but still tight on my arms.  It wouldn't matter if you're not built but if you do have some body mass, be aware of it.

I love these. I bought two for my husband and myself.  It fits my husband's Canadian passport very well. I hope they will fit our US passport once we get them. ( we will be citizens in a year :) )  When we travel, Our passport, green card, and boarding pass just fit right in.  Everything is in one place.  It might be a little expensive but worth every penny :)
One fine day if I am in a overly happy mood, I would get these my father and mother in law. I know they would love it too.

This is the best wallet I've seen to hold a passport. I actually use it to hold a Merchant Marine Credential (same size as a passport). Very nice quality. The only issue I have with it, is that there some foam padding in between the layers of the wallet. (who needs that?? It only makes the wallet thicker). I solved that by baking the wallet at high temperature (around 200 C) with a weight on it, to melt, and simultaneously flatten, the stupid foam padding. This way, I was able to get a nice flat, compact wallet.

You could probably use a hot clothes iron to accomplish the same.

I wish the manufacturer would make these wallets without the foam padding so this step wouldn't be necessary.

I bought a second wallet for my son, to hold his Merchant Marine Credential, also, and yes, I ironed it to flatten the foam padding on his as well.
summary: best wallet to hold a passport or merchant marine credential

I ordered these finger puppets, expecting them to arrive in a month's time. I was pleasantly surprised when they arrived in a week's time. The puppets have a nice velvet feel to them and for something very small, about 3 inches, they are pretty detailed like a miniature stuffed toy. It's true that the eyes are made of small beads---not a concern for me as I bought it for my already 4.5-year-old daughter for her imaginative storytelling. I have 2 reasons for 4 stars: (1) the garter stitching inside is not consistent for all the finger puppets so, some are a bit loose and they come off with movement, and (2) there is a kerosene-like smell so the finger puppets need to be thoroughly aired out. All in all, nice toy for the price, encourages imaginative play.

I receive my skirt only to find that the the material look like it was put together by someone who just started out in sewing. When wearing/trying on the skirt, it was practically see through...if one were to wear the skirt they would have to wear some kind of lining. It was a rip off for me. I tried contacting the seller to get my money back, its been two weeks that I've hadn't heard any thing.

Also, there is a small spot (easily fixable) where the manufacturer failed to sew the slip part to the waistband. Another concern, the sides are a bit crooked. One is a little longer than the other (not a huge problem). The waistband is an elastic band about 3 inches wide. Something else to consider.. I am 14, 5'1" tall, 96 lbs, and has a fairly slim figure. I generally wear a 3 in womens pants and a small in tops. I wear the skirt on my hips, right below my belly button because.. Well.. It's comfy. Where I wear it, it leaves about 1-2 inches between the bottom edge of the skirt and the ground. Very pretty, but could be a little better. WIll update after wearing for some time.

So I purchased this in order to have a nice casual high low, and when I received it, I loved it! I put it on to make sure it fit and the seam on the elastic band at the top disintegrated. I didn't even get to wear it out before it ripped apart. I am a very small person, so when this product was too small for me it had to be created a size or two too small

No I didn't contact the seller, it's not that big of a deal. The product that I received wasn't that great, and I wasn't impressed by how quickly it stopped functioning.
I don't really recommend this if you're looking for something that can be worn often. BUT if you know how to sew, enjoy it. The seam is a pretty easy place to fix, so a couple runs through a machine and you should be alright.

The only bad thing about these skirts is that they did smell a little funny when I took them out of the package (like the smell of costumes at a Halloween store), but a good wash will fix that :)

This is very cute... a stranger even said I looked beautiful when I wore it. And it flows when I walk! The underskirt keeps riding up though, so make sure to keep checking throughout the day to make sure its still pulled down.... and the elastic is a tad  it tight, but I would definitely recommend this cute skirt!

I bought this skirt to build a Halloween costume around and it is perfect! Color is exactly like picture. "One size fits all" might be a bit generous. I am about a 6/8 dress size and this would be too tight on my hips, but around my waist is fine. The underskirt of this is still see through. You can see your underwear and shirt underneath. It's a cute skirt though.

I liked this skirt.  It's very flirty!  I'm a size 8 and it fit but looked a tad bit buldgy if worn around the hips.  If worn higher up on the waist it works but it does feel tight.  Also the green wasn't very green at all.  Knowing that it's mint green helps but it's more mint than green.  Overall it's a fun skirt and can probably be let out by a tailor since there is enough elastic around the waist.  It doesn't look cheap at all either, it's just a nice sheer material.  I'm 5'6 and it is a bit short when worn around the waist but the slip covers everything.  Cute skirt and long flowy train.

This is a lovely skirt, flowy and very easy to move in, a nice tight elastic that keeps the skirt on your body but not too tight, and a very cute cut. Unfortunately, the first day I wore this skirt I wore bright pink boyshort underwear underneath it and it wasn't super noticeable, but if you looked at my backside, you'd be able to see it. I just changed into a thong and it wasn't a problem. As cute as it is, be wary that you'll want to wear nude or white underwear or a thong with this to ensure that you aren't getting odd glances in your crotch's direction...

the waste band is a bit thicker than expected and it's slightly snug for a medium if you wear it on your hips, but if you wear it as a high waist skirt then it's perfect. it's definitely worth the money in my opinion, the fabric is very flowy and pretty.

the shoes are elegant though being flats, I bought 2 pairs, however the elastic at the back doesnt sit snugly on my foot and after walking or if I walk fast they invariably slip off my foot, which means you need to stop, and reposition. I wouldnt buy them again, not worth it for the price

I didn't even need to break them in ahead of time! These are truly perfect flats!

I'm very sorry to be giving these shoes a negative rating. I bought my first pair of Reva classics in 2008 and wore then exclusively until they were literally thinning on the bottom soles. They were comfortable and well made.  I recently decided to purchase another pair to replace them and I was very disappointed. The Revas are now being mass produced in Brazil and the quality and materials are very very poor. The cut of the shoe is not compatible with the foot as it has edges which are in direct contact with the metatarsal bones and this is sooo painful after a few mins of wearing them. The insole is a narrower cut as well , and it is not comfortable to your soles. The sizing is so off that this shoe needs to be ordered a size and halt larger than your actual size. I'm shocked that the workmanship has been downgraded to this extent, after all, the shoes are among the world's most popular styles. It now has the quality of a 9 West shoe and truthfully, the 9 West is more comfortable. It's unfair that the manufacturer is getting away with charging so much for such a substandard product. These shoes are not inexpensive! I no longer recommend the brand itself and will be returning this expensive shoe for a refund. These are awful!!!

It's a pleasure to have all my testing supplies in this tidy & roomy box. The one I received is exactly like the photo an earlier reviewer posted, with beveled (not dovetailed) corners and nine slots separated by masonite dividers. Latch closure. It is an unfinished softwood box, no logo on top. 4 out of 5 of my testing stones fit, the other is extra long. Mine closes nicely and seems sturdy and well-made.

I'm not sure if the porous, unfinished wood is to allow it to breathe or not. I first kept my acids in a plastic tub, and even tightly closed, noticed that they would 'sweat' (made me a little nervous, heh). I also noticed that if they were kept in the open, everything in the immediate area rusted very quickly, So, that's my theory. It would be nice if the mfg./seller gave a little more info and all the photos were all of the same, current stock, but I'm quite satisfied with this box.

Just want to give a quick thank-you to the Amazon community for taking the time to write your reviews!

I finished watching the zoom Binocular Sunglasses commercial and thought to myself. 'This is something I could definitely use!"  I mean, the commercial made these things come across as a no-brainer, must purchase.  I was blown away at what they would be able to do!

Then I saw the price and alarm bells started going off.  Can they really deliver the product as advertised at that price?

I came to Amazon to check the reviews from my fellow consumers and thank God I did.  It's unfortunate that I get to benefit from other people's misfortunes, but without your reviews, companies such as this will continue to prey on the consumer.

Thanks again for all of your reviews!

I too fell prey to the infomercial and ordered these from the website.  I was so excited about giving these away as presents that I ordered FOUR.  Brilliant, right?  Afterwards, I came here to share my excitement and was deflated to learn they were crap.  So I immediately set about cancelling them.

For those of you who find yourself in a similar position, follow these steps.  1.  Vigilantly look for the confirmation in your email that they received your payment and it's being posted. 2. Copy the customer ID#.  3. Go to the [...] website they post in the email.  This will take you to your order. 4. Enter your name and paste in the customer ID # you copied from the email.  5. Click the CANCEL link on the left side and follow the directions.  If you did this correctly, you will see a small note in the upper left corner saying that your cancel order is being processed and that it will take 24 - 48 hours.  It didn't take that long for me.  I checked back later in the day and noted the order had been cancelled.  Check to make sure there are zeros in the balance column.

And that's it.  Painless fix to a stupid move.

Now I'm not entirely sure about this but I THINK you only have 3 business days for things to go this smoothly.  So I hope you catch it in time to cancel and get yourself out of this mess before you are stuck with a product you can't use.  Good luck!

I'm giving them 3 stars as some positive reinforcement for having this option in their customer service site and that it went so smoothly.
summary: Easy way to Cancel - Gotta act fast though

reviewText: One was broken and not operable.  The one i could see through had no magnification. Cheaply made and not as advertised.  This was a complete waste of money. The company should be ashamed as it borderlines on being a scam.

I called to order 1 zoomies for $10 and get the second pair free. The representative was trying to sell all kinds of offers. What arrived was 4 zoomies and a $36.90 credit card charge. Zoomies does bring the view closer but the image is not clear and therefore not useful.

Zoomies are the WORST product I've ever purchased.  They are a complete customer rip off and these guys know it.  Their website is deceiving and probably located offshore to evade prosecution.  DO NOT waste your time or money with this junk. They did however work well as flying targets (yes I bought 2 pairs) when shooting my shotgun last weekend.  I only wish I could have had these guys in my sights!

First 300% is 3X. but you have to understand focal length. It is called physics. You are getting a cheap pair of magnifying glasses with almost zero focal length. The only thing they would be good for is finding the focal length and use them to burn ants or bugs by focusing the sun on them. They have not the focal length to see anything clearly it would be like holding two magnifying glasses up to your eyes. Just looking at the physical aspects should tell you they won't work. It is optical physics, they can't work as advertised.

This is a shameful product playing on the ignorance of people.

reviewText: This product is great for outdoor use. And I would recommend them to anyone who be in the need of a product of this type. They also good for reading too.

Zoomies are an out-right rip off.  They are never "in-focus" and only slightly add magnification at any setting. You can do as well with two cardboard tubes from toilet tissue rolls, hold them up to your eyes and pretend you have binoculars!  People selling these should be prosecuted for fraud!

Zoomies are the equivalent of those X-Ray vision glasses you may have seen in comic books.  The commercial you've seen for this product is ludicrous to say the least!  For starters they are very flimsy and cheaply made, beyond that they only make the object appear about 12 inches closer!  Imagine holding a magnifying glass and extending your hand closer and further.  We actually died laughing - after we got over the fury of blowing $25 - yes $25!  They advertise $10 but then they charge a fortune for the shipping and handling - which is non refundable fyi.  Bottom line - do not waste your time on this!

I give them one star, only because zero isn't possible. They are VERY poorly made. The lenses are cheap plastic, that are not of optical quality. They can't be clearly focused for distance or close up. My grandson has toy binoculars that are better made, and with higher magnification. I saw them on TV, and they seemed impressive. It just didn't click, until I had placed the order, that the impressive sounding 400% magnification is only 4x. Sports binoculars are 7x-10x, and can go much higher in power for tripod mounted. Don't waste your money on this junk!
summary: Worse than a Child's Toy Binoculars!

reviewText: At a glance, anyone should be able to see that it is impossible for these to work.  They lack the very basic technology needed for good binocular vision.  Look at a pair of REAL binoculars...see how the front and back lenses are offset from each other? That is because there are some form of prism in them that allows your two eyes to see the same image.  See how the eyepieces are very small? That is because it needs to be about the same size as your eye's dilated pupil to allow the focused image to actually enter your eye.  See how there is distance between the objective lens (furthest from eyes)and the eyepiece? That is because lenses have a focal length, which is related to the distance the lens needs to be from your eye in order to see a focused image...different sizes and shapes of lenses require different distances.  Zoomies obviously have none of this.  A little bit of science goes a long way.
summary: Violates the laws of good Optics

reviewText:
If you look at the packaging, you would expect to be able to sew better, see a soccer goalie really close up at a game, and see up to 400% closer. No way folks!!

I have 20-20 vision. There was only one setting where the target was ALMOST in focus, however it was still a bit blurry. I tried all distances and settings from close up to far. I would be generous in saying the target appeared 200% closer (and still blurred).

Could you see the soccer goalie as well as it says in the picture on the packaging - well, only if you were right behind the net, at which point, why would you need these. Try sewing with them as shown in another picture, but be prepared to be stabbed by a needle.

Based on all of the negative reviews, I can't believe that no one has been forced to re-call this junk. The idea is great, but they cheeped out in the design and parts. I would have paid more if they had worked as advertized.

reviewText: In the trash it went.  I have never seen anything so cheap.  The advertising is very deceiving and should be taken off the air.

I ordered 1 pair of the zoomies magnifying glasses on the website for $10.00, and added $7.00 for the shipping and handling for a free pair, that's it, I refused everything else. My invoice said $74.70, and does not allow you to cancel the order. I called the number on the add but that was 100% automated and the customer service number I got from the sales line, the young lady said she could not help me because the order had not showed up as yet. So, I called the credit card company and they said they did not get the order as yet either. I'll have to call everyday to block this zoomies charge.  Save yourself the trouble, and buy elsewhere.

And getting two for the price of one!  So what?  Two of one piece of junk is just two pieces of junk.  Really, if you want to see something far away get a good pair of binoculars, some are cheap but for how often you will use them its well worth it when dealing with your eye sight.  And Really "300 Percent increase in viewing", that comes to 3 times increase. {?}.  Three times is nothing.  Fifteen and higher is what I find good for viewing from the cheap seats and from across the highway when I am rubber necking to see why traffic is backed up going in the opposite direction, save your money, your eyes are more important then these pieces of junk.  Thanks all.

However, in addition to it having a limited field of view, the optics are not the best.  In low light conditions, it will have darker spots in the center of vision which are annoying.  Not good for viewing TV as TV's tend to be, these days, larger than before and you end up seeing only part of the tv blown up.  You would actually, maybe, be better off with Eschenbach which has only 2x rather than these Zoomie's 3x because you would have a larger field of vision although Eshenbach's MaxTv Binocular Glasses are more expensive. I have not tried these extensively outdoor, but what little I did still had the problems of narrow field of vision. For various reasons, it's cheaper to get these Zoomies on Amazon rather than TV specials type offers.
Nothing I liked about this product.  Big waste of $10.  Just a poor product & do not recommend to anyone.

I was slacking on my game so I decided to give Zoomies a try. They INSTANTLY helped me pick up more chicks. As if it wasn't enough that they stepped my fashion game up astronomically they also served a second unadvertised purpose that is far more beneficial to me.

They ELIMINATE the "50 YARD FAKE OUT"!!! No longer am I giving what I think to be a 10 looks of desire from across the club. With my Zoomies I am able to clearly distinguish a 5 from a 7 from a certified DIME...AT 300X! They allow me from a distance to see a girls every flaw both externally and internally.

Since getting these I have dealt only with 10s and more importantly NON-CRAZIES!!

I bough this item on a chance that it would work as advertised. This item is impossible to focus . The filed of view is very narrow . The magnification is slight. If you want to watch birds or spy on your neighbors , buy a pair of Binoculars.
summary: Save your money and buy a pair of Binocculars

reviewText: Worst product i ever bought on the internet. No phone or address for warrantee return. Don't buy. You will be sorry if you do. A pure scam. Completely worthless. Don't get ripped off like i did. Say NO to Zoomies

What an awful phone system! I ordered over the phone and after getting my credit card info, I found ordering and getting out of the automated system really frustrating. The voice-controlled system didn't follow my instructions and added on some upgrade that I didn't want and there was no way of talking to someone or fixing the problem through their system. I tried and tried to find a way to go back and it was obvious they didn't want me to be able to fix a problem with the order. When I called a different phone number to trying to fix it, it is a number that only deals with delivery, not possible to fix the problem before it sends. Now I have to send it back and they wanted me to cover the shipping and handling costs. The marketability potential of the product is good, but they seem to be making a lot of enemies quickly. The "upgraded" glasses magnify slightly when fully extended, but they look ridiculous when extended and don't work at all if you don't have them extended. Neat idea, terrible product.
My husband has macular degeneration and these did not work for him at all.  They were uncomfortable and didn't help him see any better.
I ordered these for my Father, hoping they wouold help him read better; they didn't. I couldn't get them to focus at all.
summary: Glasses don't do what they are advertised to do.

reviewText: thought I'd give it a try. DON"T. Clumsy and I could not get a really good focus with these glasses. Well, now I know. Should have heeded the Amz reviews.

I feel totally taken! These things are cheap, uncomfortable and do not work for me at all! When ordering from the site, it's easy to mistakenly order more than one - I did. The shipping doubled the cost and I ended up paying over $50 for a $10 pair of Zoomies that are worth about $1! Save your money!!!

I should have been smart enough to at least get this through Amazon (but I wasn't).  The Zoomie site is very deceptive, and you can easily end up getting a double order, instead of just what you wanted (it happened to me).  As you are going through the order process, they try to sell you on a ton of options, and when you finish passing through the order, instead of showing you the total (so you can confirm the order), Boom !!! Your order is final !!! (and you have no reasonable recourse).  When dealing with "suspect" vendors, it's best to go through Amazon for some protection (I certainly wish I had).

As an observer of human behavior in it's natural habitat whilst being seemingly unnoticed, the Zoomie has made my craft easier.
I can't count how many times holding binoculars I have tripped, fallen, blown my cover or been chased by dogs. With the liberation of my hands, I am able to attend to more important matters while in observation mode.

reviewText: Before I bought this jacket, my life was spiraling out of control. I was addicted to Netflix and Little Debbie snack cakes. But the second I zipped up this miraculous gift from a higher power, my entire world changed. I grew muscles in places I didn't even know I had muscles. Just saying, but I can bench press 250lbs just by flexing my butt cheeks.  My beard filled in immediately  (which was kind of painful). I also finally understand the universal theories of quantum physics because my brain now runs on an electromagnetic pulse generator. Amazingly, of all the things this jacket has done for me, the best aspect of it is that it kept me warm when it was not warm in the outside weather.

The jacket fits my 5'-6", 150lb body fine.
Earlier, I posted that it didn't have an outside breast pocket.
I. Was. Wrong! There is, indeed, an outside breast pocket. I overlooked it! I'm just a cranky old man! Sorry Legendary People! Richard Cesena +Update - the hood, as noted by others, *is* much too small!

But other than that they are a nice quality and just like what they look like in the pictures.  I'm sure I'll be a butterfly again using these wings for many years to come.
This is a better option than the rave brands wings. Same product too. I don't have too many issues with the loops not fitting. The color is an aqua blue. Super cute.

These are beautiful and soft. I'd honestly say 4.5 stars, because I inspected the arm and finger loops and will have to reinforce them with a few stitches, but all in all, this is fantastic and I read the other reviews regarding the finger loops. They also are vibrant on BOTH sides, the inside just a tad faded, but not so huge an issue as others seemed to make it. Thank you so much! I will definitely recommend to others.

reviewText: The finger loops could be a bit bigger.

I used these wings at a rave and they looked amazing!!! When I didn't use them for pictures and such I let them fall down my back, which, according to my friend, made them look like a cape of sorts and so blended with the rest of my outfit, and I didn't have to deal with those hard white wings that are very unyielding to wear. (I used a safety pin to pin them to my bodysuit and I didn't have to deal with the annoying straps) When I had them on while dancing the sight was striking, as the wings flapped beautifully in the wind. The one downside is that, as a few reviewers have commented, the little loop that goes around your finger is not very sturdy and it ripped off the wing within the first hour of use. I imagine a couple of stitches to reinforce it would've prevented this, but I don't mind it as much as the actual wing didn't rip and it's a quick fix. One side of the wings is also more opaque than the other, which, while I personally didn't mind, might be a deal breaker for some (you can see the difference in the picture I attached). Finally, something I wish I would've done is iron the wings real quick because they still had the creases where they were folded during shipping. Overall, a really great buy and I would definitely recommend them to any butterfly ravers out there!
summary: A great buy for any rave or Halloween costume!!

reviewText:
Very cute wings! They're exactly as I expected. Although, the elastic on the fingers is a bit tight, so I ended up having to wear them up the finger instead of where rings would go. This didn't ruin anything for me though.

I do have to mention that people with bigger arms may have trouble with how tight it is. I'm a size 12-14 and they fit fine, but I can imagine someone who's size 18+ having discomfort with the arm straps.

The material is like a scarf and very light weight.  Steamed out the wrinkles and it was beautiful.  There is elastic that is used to attach to the shoulders (like a jacket) and middle finger of each hand, both are loops.  My arms are very long for a lady (5' 9") so I added my own extended loops at the end of each wing otherwise it would have been too tight and ripped.  I bought the monarch, orange color, based on other write-ups and wore the bright color on the inside (turning the elastic inside out).

The wings are beautiful, nice and soft, flowy, lovely really. My only complaint is that the elastic finger loop broke, so I had to tie a string through the wings. Not a big deal, and if I wasn't at a music festival when they broke I could have sewed it on.

Good for the price!
I had so many compliments on my wings!! They were everything I hoped they would be.

reviewText:
My mother and I tried a pair of these magnetic earrings.  We both, after around an hour or so, had to take them off because the magnet was so strong that it was painfully "pinching" our ears.  They even left dimple marks.

I returned both sets that I bought.

I would strongly recommend that you let prospective buyers know that they are VERY STRONG MAGNETS!

my wife says it's much better than she expected
Nice

"Pretty as a peacock and as sparkly as diamonds!" -that is a direct quote upon opening these lovely gems on Christmas Morning. What a hit!

Beautiful specimens!
As soon as I saw these beautiful earrings I knew I had to get them. And I had to order double so that each child could have her own set!

The jewels, we got the 7mm largest size, are lovely and large enough to look glamorous on any ear! We wanted them to be obvious, so of course, larger size. In 10 different colors they easily match most of their wardrobe! Very awesome plus!

My girls are allergic to metal. Also we have a skin issue where we heal far too slowly (I got my ears pierced when I was 8 and several decades later I still get infections as soon as the earring enters my hole and the hole is red before the earring back is placed behind it, and this reaction gets worse the longer I wear any earring. But I keep wearing them as my collection is too big to really get rid of [I must be some sort of a low level masochist, but my earrings just look so cuuuute!!!...] even plastic earrings send my ears into severe infection), so holes/piercing was out of the question for my girls, who have the same issue with skin healing.
They had been using stick on earrings for a while, but the glue itched and would leave small red rashes if worn longer than an hour. It did not seem to matter what kind of glue it was or who manufactured it, it was a casualty we had to deal with.

These are magnetic! The magnet is large and it holds very well! We were afraid we would lose them straight away, but they stayed long! Also, one child has metal allergy as well and we expected a small earring shaped green dot when she took them off. The metal paint did not react with her skin and she was able to wear these all day without any issues whatsoever! Also, we suffer severe pain for no reason, but pressure makes it awful, so I have to add that these earrings (I tried them myself) caused no real pain to be aware of. This was also a wonderful surprise for all of us after scouring several reviews about how they were too tight. We know pain. This was not pain.

Styling Tips:
We found that when you style your hair first and away from the earring there is less chance of a stray wisp disconnecting the magnetic pull through the ear. Also, metal hair pieces should be placed far enough away so as not to interfere as well. The magnets are very strong! But it is always better to be safe than sorry.

The price was a little high considering the box it was sent in. That leads me to my Only grievance:
They arrived in a card stock sort of box. I expected a lovely Jewelry sort of storage box such as was advertised in the picture perhaps with felt and quality, but what we got was something even thinner than cardboard. That was really the only bad thing I can say about this. The box in the picture is not what we received. And let me tell you, as the giver of this item, I was a little embarrassed by the flimsy presentation. Great product, no real sort of storage for them :/ Super Bummer. I almost gave FOUR stars because of this oversight alone.
But as it did not infringe on the quality of the earrings, I left it 5 stars. Again, because we were just all so pleased that the earrings were so lovely!

The seller, Bundle Monster, packaged both of them smartly for the severe weather and they were not ruined inside. The outside... there was no protecting against the torrential rain that pelted our poor delivery woman. She is something special to go through all that for us! But the product was fine; even those very flimsy containers made it here dry thanks to the smartly finagled packaging.

I would buy these again if I had to. We love the product. We wish there was a lovely box for storage, but we adore the gem jewelry and are pleased to be able to 'blend' with fashions here on that level. I recommend them to anyone wanting the pierced look but not the painful holes. We have already told many friends where to get them from and will keep telling anyone who will listen. They are that awesome!
summary: "Pretty as a peacock and as sparkly as diamonds!"

reviewText:
This dress is incredibly cute and comfortable. I think it's very stylish. I have worn it twice now and have received many compliments each time. I have been told the dress fits my figure perfectly and is very flattering.
For reference, I am about 5'4" and 145 pounds with a C cup, so I am about average height and a little thick but not too busty. The dress is short, but not uncomfortably short. One wouldn't want to bend over too much in this dress, as with any short dress, but I can sit comfortably and walk without fear of exposing myself.
The pockets and tie in the middle are positioned perfectly, in my opinion. You can actually pull and adjust the tie, so it's not just for show. The tie itself is a bit long, but it can easily be cut to fix that, although I just left it long.
I am incredibly happy with this purchase and feel it was a great price for a chic item that's comfortable to wear. I do wish more color choices were available. I'd definitely buy more!

Super comfortable and the inserts are amazing. My flat feet are so happy!

As a LD runner that hit 50 this year, my birthday present was a case of plantar faciitis in my left foot.  There isn't a lot of clear help out there...  Tried several things, but they seemed to do nothing.  BY FAR these inserts (including those for the shoes I run in--these are for my dress shoes I wear daily) have given the greatest degree of relief.  I'm not completely over it yet, but the progress in just the first week was astonishing...

These went a long way towards addressing the comfort level of a very nice pair of shoes that just didn't have enough support at the major pressure points. The leather feels nicer than the others materials insoles are usually made from. Because it is leather, it may be better to buy half a size down. I usually wear size 7 women's, but couldn't fit a size 7 insole in that shoe. One half size lower did the trick. I would love to see a version of this insole made for higher heels, and pointier shoes.
Best orthotics I have ever used.

I have bought many different OTC orthotics due to plantar fasciitis. These are among the best. I use them exclusively now and they feel good inside both sports and shoes I wear to the office that have removable insoles. I have had no foot pain since switching to these and using a night splint during the night.
Works great for someone that needs that much arch

I have problem feet. My arches are very high, and I have years of suffering from plantar fasciitis under my belt. My everyday footwear in the warmer (and sometimes into the colder) months is the Birkenstock. I need the firm support with all of that strength under my arches. I'm also a very large person, so the soft, foamy orthotics just do nothing for me. They crush flat and are completely useless.

These PowerStep Signature orthotics hold up. They are very well made, firm, and offer a ton of arch support. They fit nicely into my shoes and don't slide around, and the leather makes these feel great on my foot. Highly recommended!
summary: They crush flat and are completely useless. These PowerStep Signature orthotics hold up

I understand that folk overseas tend to have smaller body structures compared to most of us here in the States, but if one is targeting "overseas customers" one would NEED to make SIZES that will FIT the TARGETED customers!

The stud hits my ear at my ears opening not remotely close to my piercing.

Now then, onto the quality: It is sturdy metal that will allow for some bending for a good fit. I got the "silver" version and it appears pretty enough however, the little hanging jewel is,... cheap and looks as such, but I had full intentions of changing it when I bought the cuff as I am not a fan of blue.

reviewText: I wear a lot of baby doll / tunic / boho dresses and there are many that can still make you look shapely, this makes you look like you are wearing a shapeless hurl of fabric.  Fabric is also very heavy, doesn't move well.  Spent money on an expensive after shower / swimsuit cover-up.

I just received my dress (I will be wearing it as a top with white skinny jeans and sandals) and it is perfect! I washed it on gentle inside out and put it in the dryer for just a minute and then hung to dry.  No shrinkage at all.  It hits me mid thigh (which is just as the picture shows) and I am 5'7".  I am normally a size  and 10/12 usually wear a large in tops.  I am 47 years old and like clothes that are classy with a little bit of edge to them.  This top is spot on for that type of look. I normally don't do ruffles because they usually aren't very flattering on my body type (I am athletic build not a toothpick).  This top has a ruffle at the bottom and it is very flattering (it does not "poof" out like some ruffles tend to do). It looks good both on the shoulders and off. I have the black and will be ordering the white.

Because if they are, the wolf head moves around and slides ... and it always naturally ends up right next to the open/close part. In the photos, the pleats appear to run throughout the length of the skirt, which is the look that I wanted.

This was a very interesting top, but I'll most likely be giving it away for Christmas after trying it on.
The fit is good, and it is comfortable as far as "fit" goes, (very breezy, like walking around without a shirt on at all, lol!) but the material and "mesh design" was not what I expected. Another reviewed said it was "cheap material" which I don't agree with at all... this is a slightly "slippery to the touch" stretch-polyester-type material with a very cute mesh cutout as a design feature.  The mesh is from the neck, about a 2" wipe strip all the way down the sleeve.  While cute, I was hoping for "warm" and this is just not it for me.  It has no "snuggle factor", lol!

There is nothing "wrong" with this top, it's a matter of preference and taste for the wearer.  It is quite a flattering fit, but the open mesh design makes it more of a spring/fall shirt, whereas I was wanting a warmer winter top (being listed as "leisure" made me think along the lines of comfy sweatshirt material --that is my mistake).  I'm sure this will look great on my niece, and would be cute dressed for clubbing, (when comfort is MUCH lower on the priority list), but it's just too cold for me to wear.
summary: 3.5 Star top, Interesting top, unique, flattering, cute, but...

I'm very busty (34ddd) but have a small frame (25 waist, 36 hip) and I ordered the small. It actually fit perfectly and hugs in all the right places, I'm glad I didn't have to order a size up like I normally do.

With large chest, small waist, wide hips, curvy bum, this is PERFECT in a small - hugs the body gorgeously, without looking trashy.
For the body hugging jersey material, I was also concerned about it riding up my legs or booty as I walked - it did not.
For the office or my son's Senior year events, I will simply pin at the top with a brooch (creating a keyhole effect), or pin carefully inside for less of a cleavage plunge.  Otherwise, for a date, I'll let the girls have the spotlight.
The pockets wrap from front to back, and do add a tiny bit of thickness to your hips, but the proportion of sleeves/shoulders to hips works very well and balances beautifully.
I believe I'll be ordering the cappuccino colored one next
VERY PLEASED - just order at least a month before you need it!

I was expecting this item to be too small based on other people's reviews. However, I was pleasantly surprised at how well it fit around my waist and adequately covered my legs (hits the middle of my knees) which makes it appropriate for work. I paired this with a black blazer and a silver necklace and it looked AMAZING! I'm very happy with my purchase.  I ordered a small (royal blue) and noticed that the cotton fabric allows the dress to stretch where needed. That's a good thing, I can move freely if I have to run in my heels for some reason or reach over something/someone.  If you don't want to draw attention to your hips, I wouldn't recommend this dress, it hugs hips and the pockets on each side accentuate that area. But, that's the look I was going for...My measurements are:

Height: 5'6
Weight: 120 lbs
Body Type: Long/Lean...just a little bit of "curves" for hips (hips measure 35 inches around).

Again, I was looking for something that would draw attention to the only "curvy" area of my body since I have more of a long/lean figure. Sometimes, long dresses make me look like a long board with no shape if I don't accentuate my hip area. This dress did very well with that, and once I threw on a black blazer it looked very professional. If I need to go to happy  hour after work, no problem...I'll just take off the jacket, grab a small clutch and change jewelry and this dress still looks nice. Perfect quality and color for work and play.
summary: Perfect fit for Tall/Lean Body Types

These ear ring cuffs are a great "idea" but they don't work because the cuff doesn't stay on the ear.

For one thing, I don't know where the "Swarovski" part comes in, but anyhoo.... To me, the "jewel" parts seem smaller than in the picture. What's more, the earrings are very delicate and quick to move out of place if, like me, you have long hair and occasionally move it to the side out of habit. They're also very malleable, so I've started to bend the front of the earring and the back inward to try to "pinch" my ear in an effort to close better and stop moving around. (In case you're wondering, there's no twist-on backing. Instead, it's the front of the earring, a thin bar that goes through your ear, then a repeat of the front but without the cubic zorconia -- AHEM! Sorry, Swarovski. Kind of like a two-twine fork.) Overall, cute, but maybe moreso for a party or special event than for everyday use. Not only do you have to take them out each night and replace in the morning, they just seem too delicate and high maintenance for continuous use.

reviewText:
I wear size 8/10 in Women size shirts, dresses, and pants. I ordered the size Large 12/14 and found that this bustier just barely fit and I have a small chest and I don't have a huge stomach! I could only imagine if I had any sort of large bustline and this bustier would be even more problematic. The first time I tried on the bustier the boning ( which is plastic and not metal) popped out and tore right through the fabric. I had to sew it back down with my own needle and thread. The quality of the bustier is not very good, and I feel like if I move the wrong way in it, it might just bend or tear.
The material does have some stretch but the photo makes the top look more structured than it really is. The bustier is made out of a light material and doesn't really suck you in like you might imagine a corset top would. My whole point in ordering this was to get that firm corset feel up top so I could feel slimmer. I don't have a long torso but I found the bustier runs short as well. That is not too big of a deal because the photo does show the correct length and some skin is supposed to show. I understand that. Unfortunately I may have to wear a tank top underneath the bustier so the whole top doesn't tear while I am dancing and having fun at my Halloween party. I suppose this is the risk we all take by ordering online.
summary: The Sizing runs Small and the Boning is Questionable

reviewText:
I'm such a huge IronMan freak, so I had to buy this bustier...but, what a mistake!!!

The quality of the bustier is TERRIBLE, feels like it might tear apart any moment. The plastic boning came out and tore through the fabric, also in the bra area. The color of the fabric is not even like to the one in the product photo, is a lot lighter, and looks vanished in a lot of areas, faded, looks silvery in the back. Simply HORRIBLE, looks like is used! And I didn't even wear it yet!

TOTALLY DISAPPOINTED!!! I'm going to post a photo soon!
summary: VERY BAD QUALITY - Do not purchase this!

reviewText: Came on time looks great!!!!!!!!!!

Despite the "heavy gold plating" claim, after about a year of almost continual wearing, the gold is basically gone from everywhere but the valleys between links.  The clasp has turned an ugly matte silver with a hint of gold while the chain itself has darkened and feels rough to the touch.  The brass has turned the color of cheap steel in some places, and copper in other places (see pictures I posted).  I'm not sure why all the different colors but the chain has been staining my neck green/grey so I have to throw it away.  With the "lifetime warranty" claim I hoped I was buying something made to last, but apparently not.
summary: Chain is greying and discoloring my neck after 1 year of wear

reviewText:
Completely surprised by this product...in a very good way. For around $10US, I'm not sure I've ever had a better pair of sunglasses....and I'm talking about options >10X the cost.. And for polarized lens?! Incredible. Really. I've never owned a pair of Ray-Ban Wayfarer and these resemble those in terms of how they rest on your face. I don't have a huge skull, so the 55mm fits slightly bigger, but not like a massive pair of hipster frames that look like they are causing neck strain. ;) I do own a pair of Ray-Ban frames that are polarized and these zeroUV frames cost a fraction of what I paid for the Ray-Ban frames. Yes, the glass is definitely far superior in the Ray-Bans, but I am talking about my eyes looking THROUGH the lens and these zeroUV are very, very close to how comfortable they are in sunlight. To drive down costs, the glasses came in a plastic bag, but the packaging was a strong cardboard box and no damage issues with receiving them. Keep in mind that for cheaper frames, the hinges are typically not metal....these are and that makes a difference. The "turtleshell-like" pattern works pretty well if coordinating that color is your thing. The plastic that the temples (long, folding part that rests on your ears) are made out of is not the best quality, but for the price, I have zero complaints and several weeks of heavy usage has proven they are holding up well so far.

I'd buy these again and would recommend them to family and friends. For the price and for what you are getting...especially for polarized lenses, I'm unaware of a better option.
summary: in a very good way. For around $10US

I ended up giving these to my fiance who has been wearing them regularly without any issues. If it wasn't for the teeny-tiny headache issue I would have kept them around because they're on trend with what the cool kids are wearing these days.

This shirt is meant to be worn somewhat loose. There is no stretch to the fabric. I have worn a tank underneath, since the fabric is thin, but you could get away with wearing just a nude colored bra without anything showing. The gold stud style buttons are very cute, the gold doesn't look cheap and the color doesn't chip off like some cheap embellishments' color coatings might. In fact, they feel like solid metal (obviously not real gold, but an attractive metal). If gifting this item; I recommend having it shipping to yourself first, checking for loose strings, clipping them, and then gifting. Although sewn perfectly (no seams off centered or unraveling), there were a few uncut strings hanging from various seams, probably just the result of being manufactured at a quick pace. Again, this doesn't effect the quality of the garment, as they are easy to cut off, but gift wise, the random strings cheapen the look of the garment until clipped. There were only a few, so chances are you may receive a shirt with no loose strings hanging. The colors are true to the colors in the image. Overall, a very attractive, fashionable blouse. I just received my watch today and have to agree with the previous reviewer. Here goes:

1 - It looks from all pictures like the crystal (hah like its crystal) is SMOKED and the LED elements are invisible normally. The crystal is NOT smoked. Each light emitting segment is clearly visible and for me, ruins the ENTIRE effect I was interested in.

2 - The case and band pictured appear to be a light "gun-metal" color, which combined with the smoked crystal makes this watch look so cool ONLINE. What I received was definitely a DARK gun-metal color. This and the clear crystal with LEDs visible makes this watch just hideous.

3 - You have to press a button TWICE to see the complete time. Once to make it flash (yay) and show you the hours (in blue LEDs), then again to show you minutes (in red LEDs) Personally I think that is just nonsense.

4 - If you're looking for a binary watch, this is NOT binary. That doesn't bother me as I had learned that from reading elsewhere about this watch before ordering it, plus I still like this particular method of representing the time.

Minor rants: Says there is a date function. There is not. Says exclusive fold over clasp design. Exclusive to watchmakers worldwide maybe.

Conclusion: Don't buy this piece of junk unless you want something that neither does what it is advertised to do nor looks like the photos. This is cheap chinese junk.
summary: Not acceptable. False advertising and fake photos. What a rip off...

reviewText:
First off, it's NOT EVEN BINARY!  I guess you could consider it binary at a first grade level; the light is on, the light is off. First grade base two. But that's not binary.  It's simple math.  If the light is on, you count it as 1 for the hours, 5 for the minutes on the outside lights and 1 for each light in the center.  This is not a base two "binary" function.  This is addition and it's false advertising for them to suggest otherwise.

Second, this watch is heavy and kind of clunky.  It looks for the most part like it does in the picture but it's quite thick actually and less attractive in person.

Third, to read the time you have to push a button twice.  Once to read the hours and a second time to read the minutes.

Lastly, I can't even open the clasp so I can put it on. I'm afraid I'm going to break the pin just to get it open.

This watch is not impressing me so far.  It does look kind of techno, so that's cool I guess.  Now just as soon as I can wear it, I'll let you know how it feels.

reviewText:

Setting the time on this watch is simple. There are two buttons on the right side of the case. The top button is for activating the time read out and the bottom button is for setting the time. We'll call the top button, button A and the bottom button, button B.

To read what time it is-

1- Press button A once. The read out will come on immediately. First thing you'll see is the red LEDS flashing, that's just for show and doesn't mean anything, just looks cool and gets the attention of you and everyone watching.

2- Next the blue LEDS will automatically illuminate; this is the `hour' read out. Each blue LED represents an hour.

3- After the blue lights come on quickly press button A again and you'll see the red LEDS illuminate reflecting the minutes. Each red LED represents 5 minutes. There is a triangle of 4 smaller lights in the middle; these represent one minute intervals each.

To set the time-

1- Press button A once. When the blue LEDS light quickly press button B. The blue lights will now flash.

2- Press button A for each hour increment. You'll see the number of blue lights increase with each press of button A. Do this until you have set the watch to the correct hour setting.

3- Now press the B button again and the red LEDS will flash. Again press the A button until you have set the correct minutes. Once this is done wait for the watch to go off. Now go through the procedure mentioned above to read the time.
lock is very hard you must have huge muscle to release it from your arm and button broken when i use only 1 week

reviewText: I honestly was not expecting much when I bought this watch, though when I received it I was pleasantly surprised.  The watch itself is a gorgeous item and the lighting system is hypnotic and aesthetic.  When I saw the lack of instructions I was worried for a moment, but I learned how to set the watch and how to read it within minutes of pushing the buttons.  Although the watch's lack of a date function was slightly unexpected, the product has been durable, gorgeous, and a conversation piece as well.

i am overall happy with this watch, only thing i did not like was the fact that the picture showed the led lights black unless lite up but when i received it, each LED slot is white. not really the look i was going for. its as if they took the picture of the watch at night with the leds lite up then croped it in a picture taken under light. Not cool,  prob won't buy anything else from this store.

My son ordered this with his own money.  I did have an error with the shipment of this item; I rec'd someone else's while someone else rec'd mine.  They requested that I ship wrong item to customer and vice versa.  They VERY promptly credited me back my shipping cost via my word that I shipped it.  Didn't even need my receipt.  I was very impressed.  Wrong customer though didn't do the right thing and didn't ship my item to me unfortunately.  This company on good faith reshipped my item and I promptly received it within 10 calendar days or less.  I am so very very delighted and was expecting the worst but ended up being such a positive experience. There were many 'son" lessons for my son on this transaction in dealing with foreign businesses-China (awesome), the American that got my shipment, kept it, plus got his ordered item from me doing the right thing, him doing the wrong thing (boo).  AND my kiddo loves this watch too.  It is very heavy and extremely good quality.  I have no idea what a binary watch is but he claims it is so I'll believe him.  Great quality and company experience!1
summary: Great experience with customer service and son loves this watch
